metadata.name: Mama`s Flower #001
metadata.description:
This work is based on one of the hundreds of photos of flowers my mother took. She wanted to show us her garden, which I miss very much.
This work was an expression of my sadness for my parents and our traditional weekly gatherings, for the home I can't see because of the war in Ukraine.

And it was this work that launched the collection I called “Mama`s garden”.
It's filled with many symbols and deep feelings.

This work is dedicated to all those who miss their parents, their home and can't see them.
